alert.note: Alert for Dent; Maries; Phelps; Pulaski; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 11:57PM CDT until July 13 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Maries County in central Missouri... Northwestern Dent County in south central Missouri... Eastern Pulaski County in central Missouri... North central Texas County in south central Missouri... Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1157 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dixon to St. Robert to 7 miles west of Fort Leonard Wood, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rolla, Fort Leonard Wood, St. Robert, Dixon, Doolittle, Newburg, Edgar Springs, Lenox, Beulah, Devil`s Elbow, Vichy, Anutt, Northwye, Lecoma and Jerome. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 161 and 169, and between mile markers 171 and 190. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
